Meta.title: Roman Novobranets — Web Studio
Meta.description: Fast, beautiful websites for service businesses. Go live in 48 hours.

Hero.headline: Your business online in <highlight>48 hours</highlight>
Hero.sub: I build fast, beautiful websites for service businesses. You focus on your clients — I handle the digital side.

steps.title: Fill the Brief
steps.description: Answer a few questions about your business. Takes 5 minutes. I'll understand exactly what you need.

steps.title: Review the Draft
steps.description: Within 24 hours you get a working preview. We refine it together until it's perfect.

steps.title: Go Live
steps.description: Your site is deployed, connected to Google, and ready to bring in clients.

lizagar.title: li_zagar_tan
lizagar.description: Spray tan studio in Vilnius. Next.js 15 in 3 languages (LT/RU/EN), Supabase gallery with admin panel, Treatwell booking, 4.9★ from 73 reviews.

sharpco.title: Sharp & Co. Barbershop
sharpco.description: Modern barbershop landing page with online booking, service menu, and Instagram feed integration.

morningcup.title: Morning Cup Café
morningcup.description: Cozy café website with digital menu, reservation form, and location map. Designed for mobile-first experience.

landing.name: Landing Page
landing.description: Everything you need to go online.

automation.name: Landing + Automation
automation.description: A site that works for you around the clock.

Cta.title: Ready to go <highlight>online?</highlight>
Cta.sub: Tell me about your business in 5 minutes. I'll handle everything else.

NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.sub: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
